amuduwya sapayannan da aarakshitha krushi karmanthayedi wadagathwana kandayamaki.aarakshitha krushikarmanthayedi dayaka wana anekuth kandayam lesa welanda niyojithayin ha atharamadiyan aswanu wikuna ganimedi wadagath weyi aarakshitha gruha thula bhoga waga wyapthiya pasu asnawanu thakshanaya ha welandapala wagakaruwangen ekathu karana nishpadana pradhana washayen supiri welandasal sandaha athara, mewa sancharaka hotal saha thanayamwala paribhojanaya sandaha yoda gane.wagakaruwage sita atharamadiya haraha paribhogikaya dakwa wana welandam kriyawaliyedi siduwanna wu pasu aswanu hani hakithak durata awama karaganimata aarakshitha krushikarmanthayedi upayogi kara ganna aarakshitha aswanu therima, warga kirima, prawahanaya saha aswanu asirima yana kriyawali aadhara we.

mita wasara 2500 kata pamana pera wijaya kumarayage paminimatath pera sitama shri lankawe wiwidha mattame janawasa pawathi bawata sakashi thibe.wijaya kumarayage paminimen pasuwa kramawath ayurin janawasa bihiwiya.wijaya kumaru samaga shri lankawata pamini piris wiwidha sthanayanhi janawasa pihituwagath bawa maha wanshaye sadahan we.mese pihituwa ganu labu ek janawasayak wu anuradhapuraya pasu kalayedi sighra diyunuwakata lakwiya. 13 wana siyawasin pamana pasu dakunu indiya aakramana hethuwen sinhala rajadhani kramayen niritha desata sankramanaya wu athara,ee samagama jana sankhyawada,janawasada ema pradesha walata sankramanaya wiya.ee anuwa kalin wishala lesa janawasa wi thibu wiyali kalapaya kramayen janashunya bawata pathwu athara,niritha diga pradesha wala jana sankhyawath,janawasath aarambha wiya.batahira jathinta wiyali kalapaya aarthika washayen wadagath nowu athara,thama maw ratawalata amudrawya sapaya diya haki theth kalapaya pilibadawa suwishesha awadhanaya yomu wiya.enisa theth kalapaya janakirna wi janawasa wadi washayen bihiwiya.
